title: The Merchant's Gambit
goal: Introduce Seraphina, a morally ambiguous character who offers aid, but with her own hidden agenda and price.

beats.summary: Kaelen and Lyra travel to the bustling, yet shadowed, trade city of Oakhaven, a nexus of information and dubious dealings, seeking unconventional allies.
They encounter Seraphina, a shrewd merchant and informant, whose eyes hold ancient knowledge and whose connections span the underworld and beyond.
Seraphina offers cryptic information about the Shadow Blight's rapid expansion and its unusual patterns, but demands a steep, unspecified price for her insights.
Kaelen, sensing Seraphina's hidden depths and complex motives, agrees to her terms, recognizing her unique value in this altered world.
